amendment.description: To make available $18,000,000 for the provision of additional mental health services through Vet Centers to veterans who served in combat in Iraq or Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5142 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 5142 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S10898-10900; text: CR S10899) To make available $18,000,000 for the provision of additional mental health services through Vet Centers to veterans who served in combat in Iraq or Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5142 proposed by Senator Kerry.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5142 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
